attributes.action: Give Police expenses for cancelled leave during the rioting.
attributes.additional_details:
MPs who eventually returned from their holidays get full expenses. Police who have had leave cancelled get nothing. This is wrong. Much as I'd like the MPs (and Boris) stripped of these expenses, I'd like to see the Police given full expenses for any cancellations through no fault of their own.

They have done a great job under the circumstances.

Thank you for reading.
